name: adWillAutoPlay
description: Indicates whether the ad will autoplay.

name: adWillPlayMuted
description: Indicates whether the ad will play muted.

name: descriptionUrl
description: The URL of the page where the ad will be displayed.

name: ppid
description: The publisher-provided identifier for the user.

name: omidPartnerName
description: The name of the Open Measurement Interface Definition (OMID) partner.

name: omidPartnerVersion
description: The version of the Open Measurement Interface Definition (OMID) partner.

name: url
description: The URL of the ad request.

name: continuousPlayback
description: Indicates whether the video player will continue playing after the ad.
